tag_line: adds the ability to adjust the current equipped engines powercurve to every vehicle
title: [MultiSlot Plugin] Adjustable Powercurve
message:
[B]This is a plugin to the MultiSlot / General ModSlot Generator, download that first for this to work:[/B]
[URL]https://www.beamng.com/resources/general-modslot-generator-multimod.31265/[/URL]

When selected in the MultiSlot Base, makes engines powercurve and some other stuff adjustable in the tuning menu.
[ATTACH]1151822[/ATTACH]

[ATTACH]1151823[/ATTACH] 

Recommended mods to go with this:
[LIST]
[*][MultiSlot Plugin] Indestructible Engines for every vehicle:
[LIST]
[*][URL]https://www.beamng.com/resources/multislot-plugin-indestructible-engines-for-every-vehicle.31267/[/URL]
[/LIST]
[*][MultiSlot Plugin] Ultra Clutches:

[LIST]
[*][URL]https://www.beamng.com/resources/multislot-plugin-ultra-clutches.31601/[/URL]
[/LIST]
[*][MultiSlot Plugin] Ultra Radiators:

[LIST]
[*][URL]https://www.beamng.com/resources/multislot-plugin-ultra-radiators.31600/[/URL]
[/LIST]
[/LIST]
via: packed by repo on Mon, 22 Jul 2024 01:02:29 GMT
